title: What 90s song, probably R&B by a black artist goes like,' two wrongs don't make it right”? I am not to sure of the lyrics. - Quora

response.answer_text: If it was a hip-hop cut, Sister Souljah had a killer song back in the 90’s called ‘The Hate That Hate Produced’ that had the line “They say two wrongs don’t make it right, But it damn sure makes it even!” in it. In these times of weak, miserable, faggy, indulgent, uninspired garbage that passes for hip-hop, this just makes you homesick.

Two Wrongs - Wyclef Jean & Claudette Ortiz  Also, next time, try to keep one of these apps on your phone to find out song names and artist: Shazam[1]SoundHound[2]Best regards, Jesse. Footnotes[1] What Is The Name Of This Song? Find Out Without Knowing The Lyrics[2] What Song Is This? 10 Music Recognition Apps To Find Out
